context_bundle.summary: KALIC agent brain system: paths.json (tool paths), solved_problems.json (error fixes), session_*.md (daily logs). Loads via UserPromptSubmit hook. Tactical memory complementing PhiSHRI strategic knowledge.

onboarding.quick_start: KALIC brain at C:\PhiDEX\kalic_brain\. Tactical session-focused memory vs PhiSHRI strategic indexed knowledge. Hook loads on session start. solved_problems.json can sync to PhiSHRI E## doors.
common_patterns: paths.json: tool paths and PhiSHRI references
UserPromptSubmit hook loads brain at session start
